content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position (10.5, 10.5)), boiler (position (-6.0, 24.5)), and offshore pump (position (-9.5, 24.5))

### Copper plate mine at position (43.0, -84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (43.0, -84.0)) and a furnace at position ((40.0, -82.0))
-  Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and a furnace at position not found

### Iron ore mine at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and a chest at position ((-16.5, -49.5))

### Lab at position not found
Consists of lab (lab_input={'automation-science-pack': 67})

### Electricity distribution at position (2.5, 1.5)
Consists of small electric poles at positions [(2.5, 2.5), (4.5, 5.5), (8.5, 9.5), (2.5, 1.5)]

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner equipment without fuel
-  Ensure that the burner equipment has sufficient fuel before using it
### Errors when placing entities without sufficient space
-  Ensure that there is enough space to place an entity before attempting to place it
### Errors when using offshore pump without water
-  Ensure that the offshore pump has a water source before using it
### Errors when using steam engine without input liquid
-  Ensure that the steam engine has an input liquid before using it
### Errors when using furnace without ingredients to smelt
-  Ensure that the furnace has ingredients to smelt before using it
### Errors when using burner inserter without source items
-  Ensure that the burner inserter has source items before using it
